```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```



```{r}
computer <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2021/2021-08-17/computer.csv')
```

```{r}
computer %>% count(char_type, pri_type)
```


```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(tidytext)
```


```{r}
computer %>%
  unnest_tokens(words, interaction) %>% 
  rename(word = words) -> word_computer
```


```{r}
word_computer %>%
  inner_join(get_sentiments(lexicon = "bing"))  %>%
  count(char_type, word, sentiment) -> word_computer1
```
```{r}
word_computer1 %>%
  group_by(char_type) %>%
  # find the total number of words in each play
  mutate(total = sum(n),
         percent = n / total) -> word_computer2
```


```{r}
top_words <- word_computer2 %>%
  # group by sentiment
  group_by(sentiment) %>%
  slice_max(n, n = 20) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(word = reorder(word, n))

ggplot(top_words, aes(x = word, y = n, fill = sentiment)) +
  geom_col(show.legend = FALSE) +
  facet_wrap(char_type ~ sentiment, scales = "free") +
  coord_flip()

ggsave("fig.png")
```
